title: Ed Sheeran sells 'cannabis beer' at his Notting Hill pub
text:
Ed Sheeran is selling a beer called 'Cannabis bier' in his trendy new pub Bertie Blossoms, almost a year after he revealed he had stopped smoking weed.

The singer turned publican has just opened Bertie Blossoms, on West London's Portobello Road, with the venue named in honour of his wife Cherry Seaborn.

Among the selection of draft and bottled ales that the Shape of You singer, 28, is selling at his new venue is 'Cannabis Bier' for £5.20.

Controversial: Ed Sheeran is selling cannabis beer in his trendy new pub Bertie Blossoms, almost a year after he revealed he had stopped smoking weed to be 'more alert'

Cannabis beers are typically brewed from barley and infused with marijuana oil.

CBD oils used in food products in the UK is legal.Cannabis beer is not commonly sold in this country but is popular in Europe.

One staff member said: 'I'm not entirely sure what it is in it.

'I'm guessing it uses some sort of CBD oil or something.'

Up-market: The singer turned publican has just opened Bertie Blossoms, on West London's Portobello Road, with the venue named in honour of his wife Cherry Seaborn

Castle on the Hill singer Ed, 28, gave up smoking cannabis in January after saying it stunted his songwriting.

'I've stopped smoking weed,' he told Daily Mail.

'I found myself just sitting at home watching films. I only ever create sober. I like to be alert.'

He added: 'I find most ideas happen when you have a cup of tea. For me, anyway.'

The singer wrote Sweet Mary Jane about his love of the drug in 2015.

Something different: Among the selection of draft and bottled ales that the Shape of You singer, 28, is selling at his new venue is 'Cannabis Bier' for £5.20

Bertie Blossoms and opened last month ex-England footballer Peter Crouch and his model wife Abbey were among the celebs at the launch night.

Abbey was among fans to praise the bar online saying: 'Wow looking fabulous' and 'Oooo nice !!!! X'

Also on the drinks menu is a 'Ginger Bramble' cocktail for £11.

Cheeky: Castle on the Hill singer Ed, 28, gave up smoking cannabis in January after saying it stunted his songwriting

Bertie Blossoms and opened last month ex-England footballer Peter Crouch and his model wife Abbey were among the celebs at the launch night

The tipple - which may be a cheeky ode to Ed's locks - is made up of Plymouth Gin, fresh blackberries and ginger.

It comes following news that the singer made an incredible £65,000 a day in 2018, making him the highest-earning British solo artist.

Accounts released at the beginning of this month show his company, Ed Sheeran Ltd, made a gross profit of £23,770,262, equating to £65,124 a day.

Trendy: Also on the drinks menu is 'Ginger Bramble' cocktail for £11. The tipple - which may be a cheeky ode to Ed's locks - is made up of Plymouth Gin, fresh blackberries and ginger

The singer earned more than twice as much as he made in 2016 and over the last three years has made a gross profit of a staggering £61,826,786.

The accounts also show he paid £4,506,139 in tax - putting tax avoiders to shame.

Ed married childhood sweetheart Cherry Seaborn in 2018, but did not confirm the nuptials until July of this year.

Popped the question: Ed announced his engagement to Cherry, 26, in January 2018 with a candid Instagram snap

Ed and Cherry first met as children when they both attended Thomas Mills High School in Framlingham, Suffolk.

But Cherry moved to the US for university, meaning the friends lost touch. After working on Wall Street, she moved back to the UK in 2016 to be with Ed.

The couple are thought to have started dating in 2015, with Ed's best pal Taylor Swift sharing a photo of the pair kissing on her Instagram account.
